trends: There have been no other sightings in Cedar Beach
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailswas walking along cedar beach, when a hellicopter passed over head.a friend26 i had watched the hellicopter (h) pass by when we saw an silver object passseveral hundred feet above the (h)26 after it passed the (h) it started doing flips on an horizontal axis movingin a straight line towards the north. the object seemed to move at a rapid speedcompared to what an air craft would be moving. the object did not leave anysmoke\vapor trail nor did it make any sound.after about 30 seconds into itsflight, we heard another witness asking her friend if she saw what she justsaw.. i yelled to the people about 100 from us, that i just saw the same objectpass the (h). they agreed that we had all seent he same object. i did not getthe other witnesses name.
Summary: UFO sighting above Cedar Beach, Long Island.
